CustomField.description: ** System Calculated ** Link to related Subscription. Populated only when the Invoice is sent from a Subscription that is scheduled for auto-invoice on an "Installment" payment plan.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** System Calculated ** Link to related Subscription. Populated only when the Invoice is sent from a Subscription that is scheduled for auto-invoice on an "Installment" payment plan.
CustomField.label: Subscription
